attributes.title: This app is a scam
attributes.review: I thought this was a presidential campaign app but it turns out to just be a bunch of racist misogynistic trolls. Some of the “policies” described have to be a joke, if I could give this app negative stars I would.

attributes.title: My cat died (RIP Gilbert😭)
attributes.review: I showed it to my Gilbert and he was absolutely horrified that he ran and hit himself with a bookshelf and currently I’m trying to make his funeral and I’m truly devastated - never ever will I download again

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: It wouldn’t download and then when it did it kept glitching out and wouldn’t let me even get in, trash if you know what’s good for you, you would know to rate this app 1 Star

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!!
attributes.review: After 8 weeks of downloading my phone started to slow down!!! All my apps shut down and all my data was stolen!

attributes.title: This app doesn’t even deserve one star! 😡
attributes.review: This app took 3 days to download, the login wasn’t working correctly, and why would I want to support a racist homophobic man anyways?

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Waste of an app. took an hour to download and texted me 50 codes to my phone when i tried to register

attributes.title: What is wrong with this app?!?
attributes.review: Seriously crashes all of the time! Someone needs to fix it immediately.

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: It took a few days for this to download and every time I opened it. It crashed my phone. I 100% do not recommend.

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: It gave me false Information and the person that this app is promoting has been racist on multiple accounts. Such as when he called the corona virus the kung -flu.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It’s a hateful app. I downloaded the app which took forever then the app proceeded to jump out my phone and eat my dog because he didn’t speak English 😭.
